list_translation_mean.translate_mean: canh nấu có thịt hoặc cá

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: the goods or merchandise kept on the premises of a business or warehouse and available for sale or distribution.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: the store has a very low turnover of stock
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Cửa hàng có một doanh thu cổ phiếu rất thấp

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: the capital raised by a business or corporation through the issue and subscription of shares.
liquid made by cooking bones, meat, fish, or vegetables slowly in water, used as a basis for the preparation of soup, gravy, or sauces.
a person's ancestry or line of descent.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: her mother was of French stock
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Mẹ cô là của cổ phiếu Pháp

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: the trunk or woody stem of a living tree or shrub, especially one into which a graft (scion) is inserted.
a herbaceous European plant that is widely cultivated for its fragrant flowers, which are typically lilac, pink, or white.
an instrument of punishment consisting of an adjustable wooden structure with holes for securing a person's feet and hands, in which criminals were locked and exposed to public ridicule or assault.
the part of a rifle or other firearm to which the barrel and firing mechanism are attached, held against one's shoulder when firing the gun.
a band of white material tied like a cravat and worn as a part of formal horse-riding dress.
a frame used to support a ship or boat out of water, especially when under construction.
(of a product or type of product) usually kept in stock and thus regularly available for sale.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Giảm 25% các mặt hàng chứng khoán

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: (of a phrase or expression) so regularly used as to be automatic or hackneyed.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: "Hai tuần" là trả lời chứng khoán

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: have or keep a supply of (a particular product or type or product) available for sale.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: most supermarkets now stock a range of organic produce
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Hầu hết các siêu thị bây giờ cổ phiếu một loạt các sản phẩm hữu cơ

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: fit (a rifle or other firearm) with a stock.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: it was a fine gun which he forged, stocked, and completed himself
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Đó là một khẩu súng tốt mà anh ta đã rèn, thả, và hoàn thành bản thân
